attributes.action: End Lockdown and all rules in the U.K. bring back everyone freedom
attributes.additional_details: The government was created for the best interest of the people not for those who want to take power and freedom away from individuals. If people refuse to take a stand their will be no freedom left. It is not fair that we have been refused the rights to see our family the rights to where you can and can’t go this is dangerous for everyone’s mental health. The economy is shrinking the country is falling. It is wrong and unlawful to bring such laws which restrict liberty lockdown must end.
attributes.background: I think it is time the common man takes back their freedom and fights for their rights to be considered. Our freedom is being taken away day by day the U.K. is turning into a communist socialist country. We want our freedom back, our rights to live a normal life. We want out country back to normal.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
